body_html: First, I intalled CUDA10 and cuDNN 7.3.1 and the problem was still there. Then, I uninstalled both of them and reinstalled CUDA9 and cuDNN 7.0.5 again and restarted the computer. The related problem has just gone for now. Probably this is not a real solution but it works for me. Actually, finding the real causes of the errors will help other people that this solution does not work for.
